name.baseName: Soil Remediation;In-situ Remediation;Thermal Desorption;Case 2;Contaminated Soil Excavation;Excavated Soil
土壤修复;异位修复;热脱附;案例2;污染土挖掘;挖掘出的土壤

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 使用挖掘机将污染土壤挖掘出来
Use of excavators to dig out contaminated soil

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The volume of contaminated soil free site is 45,916 m3, the efficiency of the excavator is 44.6 m3/h, and the fuel consumption is 22l/h.
场地污染无土壤方量为45916m3，挖掘机效率为44.6 m3/ h，耗油量为22l/h
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described is used for environmental remediation, specifically for the excavation and thermal desorption of contaminated soil in situations where in-situ treatment is not feasible or effective. This process is typically applied in case of significant soil contamination, requiring the excavation of large volumes of soil for subsequent decontamination. The excavated soil is then treated using thermal desorption techniques to remove pollutants before the soil is considered clean and potentially reusable.
此过程用于环境修复，具体是挖掘和热脱附污染土壤，适用于原位治疗不可行或无效的情况。该工艺通常用于处理大量土壤污染，需要挖掘大量土壤以便后续的脱污处理。然后使用热脱附技术处理挖掘出的土壤，去除污染物，之后土壤才被认为是干净且潜在可重复使用的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Song, Y. et al. Environmental and socio-economic sustainability appraisal of contaminated land remediation strategies: A case study at a mega-site in China. Science of The Total Environment 610–611, 391–401 (2018).

Song, Y. et al. Environmental and socio-economic sustainability appraisal of contaminated land remediation strategies: A case study at a mega-site in China. Science of The Total Environment 610–611, 391–401 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should ensure that the LCA data appropriately represents the process of excavating and treating contaminated soil from a similar site with comparable levels of pollution and soil volume. It is crucial to account for all energy inputs, including fuel consumption of the excavators, and any additional transportation or energy required for the thermal desorption phase. When incorporating this data into a broader LCA model, users should consider the potential for material recovery and the environmental impact of the final disposal of the decontaminated soil. The technological applicability of the data should be reviewed to ensure compliance with local environmental regulations and treatment standards.
使用此数据集的用户应确保LCA数据正确反映了从污染程度和土壤量类似的现场挖掘和处理污染土壤的过程。必须考虑包括挖掘机的燃油消耗在内的所有能源输入，以及热脱附阶段所需的任何额外运输或能源。当将这些数据纳入更广泛的LCA模型时，用户应考虑物质恢复潜力以及最终处置去污土壤的环境影响。应审查数据的技术适用性，以确保符合当地环境法规和处理标准。

completeness.common:other: All maior raw materials and all the essentialenergy is ncuded.
输入输出流包括所有主要原材料和所有必要的能源消耗

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
